paper_abstract: Residue number systems are attractive due to their basic arithmetic operations, such as addition and multiplication, are carry-free; this facilitates low-power, high-speed implementations. But converting from residue to conventional notation is generally problematic. In this paper, we propose a high-speed architecture for reverse conversion; this is based on Base Extension and the Chinese Remainder Theorem.
paper_title: Fast residue-to-binary conversion using base extension and the Chinese remainder theorem
